rooms.description: Spacious area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to invite morning sunlight and ensure ample ventilation. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting seating areas towards the north.
Adjacent to the living room with a view of the garden. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall enhance natural lighting while maintaining privacy.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances and cabinetry. Designed with Vastu in mind by placing the sink near the north-west corner to promote positive energy flow.
Private master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east for natural light. Incorporates Vastu by positioning the bed in the northeast corner to ensure good health.
Comfortable guest room with a scenic view. Windows are designed for maximum natural light while preserving privacy.
Well-appointed bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom and guest bedroom. Designed with soundproofing for privacy and ventilation.
Service area for laundry, storage of cleaning supplies. Placed near the kitchen to streamline household chores.

openings.description: Welcoming entrance aligned with Vastu principles by facing the auspicious south-east direction. Features a covered porch and natural lighting.
Garage door designed for ease of access, complementing the overall layout. Incorporates sliding windows with ample ventilation.
Extensive balcony providing a view of the sunrise, enhancing relaxation and socializing space, designed in harmony with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Additional storage space for seasonal items and valuables. Ensures proper ventilation and accessibility.
Cozy study area with ample natural light from windows. Strategically placed to encourage concentration and creativity while following Vastu.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase ensuring easy access between floors, with safety handrails and proper lighting.
Essential for emergency egress in compliance with local building norms and Vastu guidelines for safe exit.
